类 BaseServlet

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        • cn.devezhao.commons.web.BaseServlet
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    RequestExecutor, java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig
    直接已知子类:
    JhtmlForward

    public abstract class BaseServlet
extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
implements RequestExecutor
    统一的 SERVLET 父类，便于统一处理
